title: Hero MotoCorp gets tax and interest notice from I-T Dept totalling Rs 605 cr for six AYs
description: Hero MotoCorp faces a tax demand notice of Rs 308.65 crore plus interest from the Income Tax Department for six assessment years. The company plans to appeal against the orders, stating the demand is unsustainable. Despite this, its total sales rose 5.5% in FY24, with motorcycle and scooter sales showing growth.
